long_description: Securely lock your Thule(R) hitch mounted bicycle carrier to your vehicle by using the Snug- Tite(TM) II Lock! Will fit all Thule 1.25- and 2-in. hitch mounted bicycle carriers-also prevents rack from wobbling while transporting bikes. Hardware, lock cylinder, 2 lock keys and 1 change key included.
short_description: Securely lock your Thule(R) hitch mounted bicycle carrier to your vehicle by using the Snug- Tite(TM) II Lock!
